name: Sokoblob
description:
It's a very basic sokoban game. The first version (v1.0.0) of this game was made in a whole day. It was made using the framework Love2D 11.1. 

Features
  • 10 levels
  • Variety : doors, buttons
  • Score (moves) on each level
  • Instructions
  • Fully playable
External links
  • Github repository (source code)
